member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.album.object_id
member.summary: The object_id of the album on Facebook. This is used to identify the equivalent Album object in the Graph API. You can also use the object_id to let users comment on an album with the Graph API Comments

member.summary: An album of photos or videos as represented in FQL

member.summary: An FQL table that can be used to return a list of a user's friends or to show whether two users are friends

member.summary: An FQL table that returns the IDs of users who like a given object (video, note, link, photo, or album).

member.summary: A representation of the permissions granted to your app by a User or Page represented in FQL

member.summary: Query this table to return information about a photo

member.summary: Represents a fql query

member.summary: An FQL table that can be used to return a list of a user's friends or to show whether two users are friends

member.summary: The user ID of the first user in a particular friendship link

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.friend.uid2
member.summary: The user ID of the second user in a particular friendship link

member.name: T:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.like
member.summary: An FQL table that returns the IDs of users who like a given object (video, note, link, photo, or album).

member.summary: The object_id of a video, note, link, photo, or album.

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.like.post_id
member.summary: The id of a post on Facebook. This can be a stream post containing a status, video, note, link, photo, or photo album. Note: These post IDs must be queried from the stream FQL table.

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.like.user_id
member.summary: The user who likes this object.Note: Indexable only for the current session user with read_stream permission.

member.name: T:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo
member.summary: Query this table to return information about a photo

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.aid
member.summary: The ID of the album containing the photo being queried. The aid cannot be longer than 50 characters. Note: Because the aid is a string, you should always wrap the aid in quotes when referenced in a query.

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.caption
member.summary: The caption for the photo being queried

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.created
member.summary: The date when the photo being queried was added

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.link
member.summary: The URL to the page containing the photo being queried

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.modified
member.summary: The date when the photo being queried was last modified

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.object_id
member.summary: The object_id of the photo.

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.owner
member.summary: The user ID of the owner of the photo being queried

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.pid
member.summary: The ID of the photo being queried. The pid cannot be longer than 50 characters. Note: Because the pid is a string, you should always wrap the pid in quotes when referenced in a query.

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.position
member.summary: The position of the photo in the album

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.src
member.summary: The URL to the album view version of the photo being queried. The image can have a maximum width or height of 130px. This URL may be blank.

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.src_big
member.summary: The URL to the full-sized version of the photo being queried. The image can have a maximum width or height of 720px, increasing to 960px on 1st March 2012. This URL may be blank.

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.src_big_height
member.summary: Height of the full-sized version, in px. This field may be blank.

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.photo.src_big_width
member.summary: Width of the full-sized version, in px. This field may be blank.

member.name: T:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user
member.summary: A user profile as represented in FQL. If you need user information for analytic purposes, query the standard_user_info table instead.

member.summary: More information about the user being queried

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.activities
member.summary: The user's activities

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.birthday_date
member.summary: The user's birthday in MM/DD/YYYY format

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.books
member.summary: The user's favorite books

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.email
member.summary: A string containing the user's primary Facebook email address or the user's proxied email address, whichever address the user granted your application. Facebook recommends you query this field to get the email address shared with your application.

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.first_name
member.summary: The user's first name

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.friend_count
member.summary: Count of all the user's friends

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.friend_request_count
member.summary: The user's number of outstanding friend requests

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.middle_name
member.summary: The user's middle name

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.mutual_friend_count
member.summary: The number of mutual friends shared by the user being queried and the session user

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.name
member.summary: The user's full name

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.timezone
member.summary: The user's timezone offset from UTC

member.name: P:ComputerBeacon.Facebook.Fql.user.uid
member.summary: The user ID

member.summary: The user's username
